title: Health Connect syncs data between Android fitness apps like Fitbit, Samsung Health, and more
content:
On Android, there are dozens of fitness apps you can use to track your steps, goals, and exercises throughout the day. Google’s new Health Connect app promises to sync fitness data from various Android apps including Fitbit, Samsung Health, and more.

more…

The post Health Connect syncs data between Android fitness apps like Fitbit, Samsung Health, and more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google's new Health Connect app promises to sync fitness data from various Android apps including Fitbit, Samsung Health, and more.
